Uses of Class
com.basho.riak.client.http.request.MapReduceBuilder

  • Packages that use MapReduceBuilder 
    Package Description
    com.basho.riak.client.http
    The legacy, low-level HTTP REST RiakClient and associated classes, consider using the high-level IRiakClient
    com.basho.riak.client.http.request
    Riak request classes for the legacy HTTP REST client, consider using the high-level IRiakClient

    • Uses of MapReduceBuilder in com.basho.riak.client.http

      Methods in com.basho.riak.client.http that return MapReduceBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      MapReduceBuilder RiakClient.mapReduceOverBucket(String bucket) 
      MapReduceBuilder RiakClient.mapReduceOverObjects(Map<String,Set<String>> objects)
      Same as RiakClient.mapReduceOverBucket(String), except over a set of objects instead of a bucket.
      MapReduceBuilder RiakClient.mapReduceOverSearch(String bucket, String search)
      Same as RiakClient.mapReduceOverBucket(String), except over a riak-search query instead of a bucket.
